=== Something about me ===

Ciao! 
I'm Dario Cavedon. I'm a young 41 year old "boy" (maybe I'll cut this part, I've to keep it up to date!), I'm married with a wonderful woman and I've got 2 wonderful daughters. Ah! They say that there is also a cat in our family, Minù and a guinea-pig, Mirtilla. 

I discovered Ubuntu (and then Kubuntu) in the 2004. Before, I used others operating systems from Windows 3.0 to XP (but not Vista!), then I passed Red Hat Linux, Fedora Core e Mandrake. I like Ubuntu (and Kubuntu in particolar) for the strenght of its Comunity. At home I use Kubuntu, and Ubuntu too, to keep me up to date.

=== Skills ===

* I work for an italian bank, in IT department. Most of my spare time is all for my women e my computers.
* I have skill on Project Management, I've done it several times for my job.
* The rest of my spare time is dedicated to Linux - I'm a intermediate user - I like programming, but I don't have enough time to do it!
* I'm one of the founder member of <nowiki>[[http://avilug.linux.it|AVi LUG]]</nowiki>, a Linux User Group based at Schio (Vicenza).

=== Ubuntu Manual ===

I'm the italian translator of the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-manual|Ubuntu Manual]]</nowiki>: only few strings and it will be completely translated! I hope to finish it!

=== Noisiamoubuntu ===

I recently started a projet called <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/GruppoPromozione/NoiSiamoUbuntu|NoiSiamoUbuntu]]</nowiki> for the Ubuntu Italian Marketing Team. It's a <nowiki>[[http://noisiamoubuntu.posterous.com|blog]]</nowiki> made of weekly interviews with normal people that use Ubuntu in their work or at home. The project is very successfull, we have received a lot of interviews, and other people are still sending us their opinion about it.
